questions.question: In the two sample t-test problem, the population variance is to be estimated by using

answers.a: difference between two sample mean squares
answers.b: sample mean square of first sample only
answers.c: sample mean square of second sample only

questions.question: While testing the two sample t-test problem with samples of sizes n<sub>1</sub> and n<sub>2</sub> respectively, the test statistic follows
